Articles.Content:
i am in sandbox mode and my buildings are therefore at the max level, but sometimes when i go to launch a craft it glitches out and tells me that the launch pad/runway and vab/sph are level 1 and cannot support more than 20 tonnes. also i cant have my kerbals do an eva because my astronaut complex is to low of a level even though its in sandbox. 

has any one had a similar problem 

this is currently a huge problem because i Need to get a kerbal out to repack parachutes or i will lose a colony seed ship (edit) now vab wont let me have action groups

Edited March 23, 2020 by zeilden

I have been having the same issue as you and after probing for a while I was able to conclude that the mod that is causing the glitches is Custom Barn Kit. The solution to the problem is just to uninstall the mod or downgrade your game version. 

Edited March 28, 2020 by Harry_P_Llama

On 3/28/2020 at 12:07 PM, Harry_P_Llama said:

I have been having the same issue as you and after probing for a while I was able to conclude that the mod that is causing the glitches is Custom Barn Kit. The solution to the problem is just to uninstall the mod or downgrade your game version. 

oh thank you

If you think there's a problem with Custom Barn Kit then a) check you're using the right version of CBK for your version of KSP and b) if you are, post in the CBK thread so someone can fix the problem.
